title: Revenue Recognition Controller
description:
Financial Controller Module: Revenue Accrual, Forecasting, and Cash Flow Projections

Build a comprehensive financial controller module that manages revenue recognition, generates financial forecasts, and projects cash flow across multiple time periods.

Requirements:

Revenue Accrual:
- Implement revenue recognition logic following appropriate accounting standards (GAAP/IFRS)
- Handle deferred revenue for multi-period contracts
- Calculate and track accrued revenue that has been earned but not yet invoiced
- Support multiple revenue recognition methods (straight-line, milestone-based, usage-based)
- Provide audit trail for all revenue accrual transactions

Forecasting:
- Generate revenue forecasts based on historical data, pipeline, and growth assumptions
- Support multiple forecasting models (linear regression, seasonal trends, weighted pipeline)
- Allow manual adjustments and override capabilities
- Calculate confidence intervals or forecast accuracy metrics
- Enable scenario modeling (best case, worst case, most likely)
- Forecast at various granularities (monthly, quarterly, annually)

Cash Flow Projections:
- Project operating cash flow from accounts receivable and payable
- Factor in payment terms and historical collection patterns
- Account for planned investments and financing activities
- Generate rolling 13-week cash flow projections
- Identify potential cash shortfalls with advance warning
- Support sensitivity analysis for key assumptions

Technical Considerations:
- Design data models for financial transactions, forecasts, and projections
- Implement calculation engine with version control for methodology changes
- Create API endpoints for creating, updating, and retrieving financial data
- Build administrative interface for configuration and manual adjustments
- Ensure data accuracy through validation rules and reconciliation checks
- Include comprehensive logging for debugging and compliance

Deliverables:
- Core controller service with business logic
- Database schema and migrations
- API documentation
- Unit and integration tests achieving >80% coverage
- Performance benchmarks for calculations with large datasets
